summary: In a totalitarian future where deviants are held in rehabilitation camps, a freedom fighter and a wrongly-accused prisoner form an alliance to survive their decadent oppressors' game of kill-or-be-killed - and turn the tide against them.
cast: Steve Railsback|Olivia Hussey|Michael Craig|Carmen Duncan|Noel Ferrier|Lynda Stoner|Roger Ward|Michael Petrovitch|Gus Mercurio|John Ley|Bill Young|Steve Rackman|John Godden|Oriana Panozzo|Fiona Maconaghie|Kerry Rossall|Brian Trenchard-Smith
title: El imperio de la muerte
